sections.heading: Segregation of horsemeat products sold at retail from other meat products3-2127
sections.text: Segregation of horsemeat products sold at retail from other meat productsAll horsemeat or horsemeat products sold at retail shall be sold from a case separate from that which contains the flesh of cattle.
